item.description:
Sincerely trying to take the burden off of Karen's shoulders, and help round off the planning for our ambitious Dec 6 trip to Broadway, to see Equus.

So, why don't we very informally meet at Ruby Tuesday's in Cromwell, Exit 19 off Rt 9 in Cromwell (K-Mart Plaza,) at 7:00 pm, and decide whether we will travel by train, car or bus then. A drink always helps us think clearly, so I will bring all the information printed out for us to choose.

The show is at 2:00 pm, I suggest we leave in the morning and do some sightseeing, visit nearby landmarks, etc. I will have it all planned out by this date. So if you replied "yes" for Equus, please come!

All movie fans are welcome to join us for a drink, even if you're not coming to NYC.
item.how_to_find_us: Call me at my cell 860-710-0300, find me at the door
item.name: Equus Trip Planning
